channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2023110766
item.description:
Report X-2023110766

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-08T18:13:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-04
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found and places into a bin. DescribePack: The package failed due to the cap from the bottle coming loose . DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was places into a red hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023110759
item.description:
Report X-2023110759

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-08T18:13:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-04
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet, damaged package unloaded from trailer and removed from workflow. Package was left at Unload manager's workstation and brought to the attention of QA member. Package was placed in a plastic tote. DescribePack: Bottles have loose caps. Package experienced compression/crushing and leaked. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a plastic tote to prevent further release or seepage of corrosive liquid.

item.title: Report X-2023111266
item.description:
Report X-2023111266

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-22
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was dropped and damaged during sortation causing the liquid to leak wetting the contents and carton. Pkg was placed leaking in an unauthorized unlined plastic bin damaging/contaminating the bin. The pkg in the bin was sent to QA where it was later taken to the HMPA for inspection and proper handling. DescribePack: Safety ring and friction lid failed when pkg was dropped. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin.

item.title: Report X-2023110553
item.description:
Report X-2023110553

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-06T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-27
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Automotive part placed in carton with absorbent padding and plastic bag. No Hazmat identifying markings on carton which is stained from the release of gasoline from the automotive part. Pkg was placed on a conveyor and sent to QA where it was later transferred to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose fitting closures on 1 x 1 automotive fuel pump with gasoline still in the part. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Upon inspection at the HMPA the pkg was placed in properly lined salvage drum to await disposition.
